column4: i've an amd64 processor, should i stay with the generic kernel or install the k7 one ?
is there a big difference between generic kerbel and k7 one ? (for amd64 scope) ?
check out the files that the jdk installs: http://packages.ubuntu.com/cgi-bin/search_contents.pl?searchmode=filelist&word=sun-java6-jdk&version=feisty&arch=i386
